column3: Didn't you hear me? Come here and I shall guide you.
Where do you think you're going? The Adventurers' Guild is the <Emphasis>other</Emphasis> way!
Halt! Unregistered outsiders are not permitted beyond this point. If you wish to remain in our city, you must obey our rules and proceed to the Carline Canopy at once.
You're not from around here, are you? You should probably speak with Mother Miounne first. She's over at the Adventurers' Guild counter.
Within these gates, you are bound by our laws─laws with which you are no doubt unfamiliar.
Listen well, and I shall guide you.
Welcome to Gridania, a vibrant forest nation cradled in the bosom of nature.
Follow the instructions to move your character and adjust the position of the camera.
When you are ready to proceed, speak to Bertennant.
Please select the control scheme you wish to use.
